short_description: vis.social is an open social platform for creative people, especially anyone in SciArt, SciComm, data, visualization, creative coding, and related arts and research. English is the common language of the instance.
description:
A social space for anyone in SciArt, SciComm, data, visualization, creative coding, and related arts and research. Share your work, discuss, critique, and ask for help! Come one, come all: → creative coders
→ data scientists and visualizers
→ generative artists
→ visual researchers, curators, and critics
→ anyone else data- or visualization-adjacent If you are curious about the world and creativity, you are welcome here. Learn more. English is the common language of the instance. Other languages are welcome, but please be kind and post English translations so that we can all read your posts.

name: comicscamp.club

short_description: A friendly home in the Fediverse for creators and lovers of comics and narrative art of all sorts.
description: ComicsCamp.Club aims to be a friendly and peaceful home in the Fediverse for all manner of comics and narrative art creators and lovers, whether you're a professional or a fan. It's a place aiming to be as inclusive and supportive as possible of people from varying faiths, sexualities, genders, and backgrounds, and its Code of Conduct will be strictly enforced. Registrations are closed to allow the instance to grow organically through word of mouth, and to keep the community as safe and fun as possible. Invitations are available from @CampCounselor or from any ComicsCamp.Club user.

description:
This is a mastodon instance that allows users to share ideas and participate in discussions.

Whitespashe is named after the Admins' first joint coding project, which replaced spaces within a Word document with non-printable characters. This would preserve readability, but would fool plagiarism detection sites such as Turnitin.
This site was named after this project, as it represents a desire to create whilst simultaneously sticking it to the Man (or in this case, the hellscape that is Twitter).
Our code of conduct and extended information can be found after the 'Learn More' link below!

name: mastodon.eus
title: Mastodon.eus
short_description:
Mastodon.eus euskara eta euskal kulturaren komunitatearentzat sortutako Mastodon instantzia bat da.

2018an hauek sortua: Azkue Fund, Dinahosting, iametza, Laborategia.eus, PuntuEUS eta Talaios Koop
description: Euskal komunitatearen fedibertsoko txokoa mastodon.eus euskal komunitateak sare sozial libre eta deszentralizatu honetan bere espazioa izan dezan helburuarekin abiatu da. Ez dakizu zer den Mastodon? Zalantzak dituzu? kaixo.mastodon.eus webgunean informazio interesgarria aurkituko duzu: * Nola hasi atala: Kontua sortu, pertsonalizatu eta lehen toot-a bidaltzeko pausoz pausoko azalpenak *Ohiko galderak atala: Mastodoni buruzko ohiko zalantzak, kontzeptuak eta terminologia, erabiltzaileak eta kontuak, aplikazioak, mastodon.eus... Prentsa atala: Kazetari, blogari eta abarrentzat materiala. Momentuz Mastodon.eus eta Mastodon logoak. Aurrerago material gehiago mastodon.eus hainbat eragileren arteko elkarlanetik jaio da, denboran irauteko helburuarekin eta euskarazko komunitatearen inguruan sor daitezkeen bestelako instantziekin erkatzeko borondatearekin, baita, beronen inguruan eragile gehiago biltzen joateko asmoarekin ere. Hasiera batean honako erakunde eta pertsonen ekimenez abiatu da egitasmo hau: *PuntuEUS Fundazioa *Azkue Fundazioa *Iametza *Laborategia 2.0 *Talaios Koop. *Dinahosting

short_description: My entry into the fediverse.  Registrations require approval for now as I do not want my instance to turn into a part-time job.
description:
Folks, If you want to register here, feel free.  However be aware that this instance is a hobby.  I started it so I could join Mastodon in what I felt was the "proper" way.  I realize that many folks do not have the skillset to run an instance, so if this instance helps with that, awesome. 

It runs on 10 year old hardware in my basement.  I've got a ton of IT experience in keeping things operational, and self hosting is basically who I am, but as I stated, Hobby.  

You've been warned.  ;)

Une fois pour TOOT !

This instance is provided by Petites SingularitÃ©s ASBL for like-minded people in Brussels and elsewhere.

We speak English, French, Dutch.

Discuss this on ps.zoethical.org.

Support this instance

Send donations to IBAN BE16 3630 1548 4674 (Petites SingularitÃ©s ASBL) with mention â€œps.s10y.euâ€ (and your name if and only if you want to be credited): we publish donations as we receive them, and expenses. Yearly service is expected to cost ~ 150 â‚¬ (without sysadmin expenses.)

Norms

  • Use English, French, or Flemish on this instance. Other languages will be excluded.
  • Be excellent to each other! We reserve the right to ban anyone who doesn't comply.
  • Fight the power!

Break in Case of Emergency

If you have any problem with someone on this instance, thank you to flag messages appropriately and contact the staff.

As this is a federated network, we expressly forbid contents such as: spam, pornography without NSFW tag, hate speech, racism, sexism, consumerism, corporatism, and nationalism.

Your Friendly Staff

@how, @natacha.

name: hackers.town
title: hackers.town
short_description: A bunch of technomancers in the fediverse. This arcology is for all who wash up upon it's digital shore.
description:
A bunch of technomancers in the fediverse. This arcology is for all who wash up upon it's digital shore.



We are based in the U.S. and we abide by all laws of this nation.

We will not tolerate hate speech, nor racist, sexist, homophobic, or transphobic behaviour, nor casteism and advocation of casteism. Reports of such behavior will be investigated and dealt with as swiftly as possible.

We take security and your privacy seriously. We do not use ads, nor sell your information.

Your data is not mine to own.

Anyone posting copyrighted material in this community, by the copyright holder or not, will lose control of where their works may travel due to the nature of federated services. In laymans terms: You should not expect to be able to put the genie back into the bottle if you post it here.

Hackers.town is protected by Sophos Intercept X EDR. We log any and all attempts to compromise the server.

name: know.me.uk
title: know.me.uk Mastodon
short_description: UK Based Mastodon Server - available to *humans* and *purposeful* automations.
description:
UK Based Mastodon Server - available to all *humans* and *purposeful* automations.  

Run by some folks who run an IT Support and Services company in Exeter, Devon, UK and providing this as a "free of charge" service to support the Mastodon decentralised community effort.

If we know you already (personally or professionally) that's great, but that isn't a requirement for an account here at all. 

Your race, sexual orientation, chosen career, work status, financial standing etc and all the other discriminatory things are not relevant here - you're welcome regardless.

The only real requirements are:

- Don't do illegal stuff, the law didn't magically go away here

- Don't use the platform to attack other people, systems or services

We're not interested in your data, we're not interested in tracking you - there is no dodgy dealing going on behind the scenes and we absolutely promise your data is NEVER open for sale to anyone else.

Use common sense. Otherwise, enjoy!

name: z80.tech
title: Mastodon
short_description: The place to go for 8-bit retrocomputing, and for being yourself.
description:
The z80.tech Mastodon instance is the place to be yourself. Whatever your identity, you be you. On this instance, we don't require content warnings for things that don't hurt decent people. Talking about LGBTQI+ issues is welcome. Being a sexist, homophobe or transphobe is not. Talking about bigotry, racism and the experiences of underrepresentation is welcome. Being a bigot, racist or ableist is not. Trolls are not welcome.

This is also the place to go for 8-bit retrocomputing lovers, assembler language geeks, Generation X software developers. Don't let the name fool you, 6502, 6800 and 8080 lovers are just as welcome!

name: savageworlds.social
title: Mastodon
short_description:
This Savage Worlds community is a place for everyone who enjoys playing and/or GMing the Savage Worlds #ttrpg by Pinnacle Entertainment Group (PEG). Join the community as we (try to) keep it fast, furious, and fun while talking about the base system for Deadlands, 50 Fathoms, Rifts for Savage Worlds, Pathfinder for Savage Worlds, and many other worlds created by PEG and their community of Aces (licensees). Savage Worlds is your best choice for fantasy, western, sci-fi, or any genre of tabletop RPG.

This community was made available using the Mastodon social network.

short_description: A server for occultists and those interested in occultism.
description:
#1 chaos magick server on the Fediverse. We welcome all to our community, but please leave the edge for the pizza cutters.

Also note that ALL people who consider themselves occultists or who are interested in occult things are more than welcome to join. We do not welcome any magick practice that supports authoritarianism, fascism, racism, or any other form of hatred.

This is a place to have an open mind and a friendly community.

Or else.

description: Welecome to INDIEWEB.SOCIAL A Mastodon instance focused on all things #OpenWeb: including the #Indieweb movement,the #Fediverse, #Mastodon Social, #Selfsovereign #identity (#SSI), #Humanetech design and #Calm technologies and more. Discussing, Promoting, and Building This instance will be a home to others focused on this, an amplifier to key voices across the open web and open social spaces, as well as over time, a lab to implement early experiments on how such technologies can be optimized and implemented on the #Mastodon platform. We are committed to the Mastodon Server Covenant.

short_description: IDIC is a tenet of Vulcan philosophy: Infinite Diversity in Infinite Combinations. Our goal is to be a fun, welcoming place for everyone.
description: IDIC is a concept from Star Trek, a basic tenet of Vulcan philosophy: Infinite Diversity in Infinite Combinations. In that spirit, the goal of IDIC Social is to be a fun, welcoming place for everyone. That's really it. We encourage interaction, and respect for the server's other users and the Fediverse at large.

name: mastodon.uno
title: Mastodon Uno Social Italia
short_description:
Mastodon.Uno Ã¨ la prima comunitÃ  generalista italiana del social Mastodon.
Con oltre 50.000 iscritti Ã¨ il piÃ¹ grande nodo Mastodon italiano.
description:
Mastodon.uno Ã¨ il social network generalista Italiano parte della piÃ¹ grande rete internazionale di social interconnessi liberi ed open source: Il Fediverso, un neologismo composto dall'unione di due parole "federazione" e "universo". Ãˆ un nome comune per i social network federati che funzionano con software libero aperto su piÃ¹ di 6000 server in tutto il mondo e che al momento supera i 4 milioni di iscritti. Storicamente, questo termine ha incluso solo le piattaforme di microblogging che supportavano un insieme di protocolli chiamati OStatus. Con la comparsa e l'ampia adozione di un nuovo protocollo standard chiamato ActivityPub si Ã¨ creata un grande numero di nuovi progetti liberi che intendono dare un'alternativa ai social commerciali. I social network del Fediverso sono molto differenti rispetto alle piattaforme mainstream (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, ecc). In primo luogo, tutte le reti federate sono sviluppate da comunitÃ  di persone in tutto il mondo, indipendentemente da qualsiasi societÃ  o istituzione ufficiale. Questo significa che puoi partecipare allo sviluppo e alla crescita del Fediverse. Tutte le competenze sono preziose: diffondere la parola, invitare amici sono attivitÃ  molto gradite. Un'altra differenza di questi social network dai silos aziendali Ã¨ il principio della federazione. Le reti principali concentrano milioni di utenti sui loro server. Questo dÃ  loro il pericoloso potere di controllare le informazioni e di accumulare i dati privati degli utenti, utilizzandoli a scopo di lucro commerciale (e chissÃ  quali altr scopii). Le reti Fediverse sono progettate per essere gestite da chiunque: sei libero di scegliere e registrarti su qualsiasi server che ti piace, puoi scegliere la persona che si occuperÃ  dei tuoi dati - l'amministratore del tuo server. Se hai una ottima conoscenza tecnica, puoi amministrare il tuo server per i tuoi amici e la tua famiglia, collegandoti a tuo piacimento con migliaia di altri server indipendenti attraverso il web. In un certo senso, Fediverse Ã¨ un universo autonomo dove il potere e i dati sono decentralizzati e sparsi in piÃ¹ paesi, mentre i siti web aziendali tradizionali si sono fatti ciascuno un imperatore (o un tiranno?) del proprio enorme impero, circondati da alte recinzioni, e riservano a se stessi tutte le decisioni, il controllo dei dati e la censura. Mastodon.uno Ã¨ interconnesso con tutte le reti federate ed Ã¨ interoperabile con ognuna di loro fancente capo al "Fediverso" ed Ã¨ la community italiana ad essere consigliata dal sito ufficiale di mastodon in quanto segue rigidi criteri di affidabilitÃ  fra cui: ci sono piÃ¹ di un responsabile tecnico disponibile 24h in caso di problemi, garazie nel mantenere il sito attivo online, moderazione attiva contro azioni discrimitorie e di odio. Mastodon.uno Ã¨ inoltre una delle poche istanze in cui Ã¨ attiva la ricerca sul testo, che Ã¨ disattivata nella maggior parte delle istanze in quanto richiede un'enorme potenza di calcolo.

Mastodon non ti obbliga a iscriverti con il tuo nome e cognome o con il tuo numero di telefono, puoi mantenere la tua privacy ed utilizzare qualsiasi nome, abbiamo solo bisogno di una email per la verifica. Oppure al contrario se desideri avere un account con una identitÃ  vericata/verificabile basta inserire un piccolo script che trovi nel tuo pannello di modifica del profilo all'interno della home del tuo sito. Oppure utilizzando l'app open source keybase per verificare la propria identitÃ  su piÃ¹ social: keybase su mastodon.uno, keybase Ã¨ una piattaforma con cui si puÃ² confermare che diversi profili social facciano capo a sÃ© (per intenderci confermi gli account che gestisci), in modo sicuro utilizzando la crittografia. I social commerciali come facebook e twitter negli ultimi anni si sono distinti per la capacitÃ  di disseminare disinformazione, teorie cospirazioniste e con lo scandalo Cambridge Analytica, la manipolazione dell'opinione pubblica. Inoltre le fake news, gli haters, la profilatura e la vendita dei dati personali a scopi commerciali. Questi ed altri sono i fenomeni problematici emersi solo negli ultimi anni attorno e dentro ai social network commerciali, Facebook in primis.
Facebook, Twitter eGoogle esistono vendendo i tuoi dati a terzi inserzionisti per sovvenzionare i servizi che ricevi gratuitamente, ma questo Ã¨ molto negativo per la privacy degli utenti, perchÃ© le aziende sono incentivate ad abusare il piÃ¹ possibile della tua privacy. L'alternativa Ã¨ il modello di Mastodon... abbiamo una certa percentuale di utenti che donano ed Ã¨ questo che ci sostiene.
I social come facebook e twitter devono rispondere ai loro azionisti e aumentarne i profitti, usano gli algoritmi per creare la bolla di filtraggio: una gabbia rassicurante allâ€™interno della quale, grazie allâ€™intervento dei dati profilati di ogni utente, vediamo quasi esclusivamente contenuti che confermano quelle che giÃ  sono le nostre credenze.

Lungi dal mantenere la promessa originaria del web, ovvero offrire agli utenti unâ€™informazione libera e diversificata, Facebook e compagnia non farebbero che mostrarci quello che vogliamo vedere, tenendoci spesso al riparo da informazioni che potrebbero incrinare le nostre certezze e rendere la nostra esperienza sui social media meno confortevole, questo rendere sempre piÃ¹ piacevole il trascorrere il tempo nei social ha come effetto un aumentando della permanenza e la dipendenza da social.

Se Ã¨ vero che i social hanno accorciato le distante e favorito lo scambio e la comunicazione a distanza, Ã¨ altrettanto vero che il prezzo da pagare in termini di rinuncia alla privacy e controllo sociale Ã¨ davvero troppo alto.

Simile a Twitter nelle funzionalitÃ , le caratteristiche di Mastodon Italia sono profondamente e concettualmente molto diverse, al punto di farne una sorta di anti-Facebook. Anzitutto la tutela dell'anonimato, questione maggiormente critica se consideriamo la creatura di Mark Zuckerberg. Mastodon, invece, Ã¨ pensato e sviluppato per non pubblicare nÃ© conservare alcun dato sensibile, a tutela della privacy degli utenti. In questo senso, dunque, non profila e non detiene alcun dato personali a scopi commerciali o politici, non utilizza pubblicitÃ  o script che potrebbero profilare gli utenti e venderli per scopi commerciali ma si mantiene con le donazioni su Patreon.
Il software Mastodon non monitora tutto quel genere di informazioni che invece vengono registrare da piattaforme sociali correlate come Twitter, Instagram o Facebook: non calcola chi secondo lui potrebbe diventar mio amico/a. Non registra i millisecondi su cui mi soffermo su unâ€™immagine, gli errori di battitura, i like, il tasso di engagement o il tipo di relazione che intercorre tra me ed un altro utente, quale sia il mio lavoro, i luoghi che visito. Non geolocalizza la mia posizione. Come vedremo, Mastodon manco mi chiede come mi chiamo e non mi obbliga nemmanco a comunicargli tutti i numeri nella mia Rubrica. Inoltre, come vedremo, puoi far sÃ¬ che non sia in grado di leggere quel che tu scrivi. Il software Mastodon, insomma, raccoglie giusto le informazioni tecniche necessarie a funzionare.
Mastodon non Ã© legato a doppio filo al tuo telefono o ad una singola app, per cui puoi accederci attraverso una delle app per android e iphone gratuite e open source, ma anche se il telefono lâ€™avessi perso o distrutto potrai utilizzarlo. In effetti si puÃ² benissimo usare Mastodon su PC Linux, Windows, Mac e su qualsiasi altro dispositivo via Browser senza mai dover dare il tuo numero di telefono.
Il software utilizzato dai server Mastodon Ã© F.L.O.S.S. ossia aperto, libero e verificabile da chiunque. Qualsiasi persona capace di programmare puÃ² verificare ciÃ² che il software Mastodon fa, esattamente come un meccanico che puÃ² aprire un cofano, vedere il motore, trovarne i difetti, metterci le mani e migliorarlo
Mastodon, inoltre, viene gestito in modo collettivo, senza un vero e proprio padrone, ogni contenuto inserito rimane di proprietÃ  dell'utente, puÃ² essere esportato e salvato per intero e utilizzato per altre piattaforme compatibili, in questo modo non si perderanno mai i contatti e i contenuti creati.
Mastodon.uno Ã¨ autogestito ed autofinanziato, non Ã¨ una societÃ  che cerca di creare profitto dalla tua vita e dai tuoi contenuti. Il tuo supporto via Patreon o Liberapay Ã¨ fondamentale per mantenere questo servizio attivo ed efficiente.





Puoi seguire Mastodon.uno sui profili ufficiali:
Matrix> NoBlogo>
Mastodon>
Peertube>
Twitter>
Pixelfed>.

description: This is a Mastodon instance run by the Interlinked Foundation, a 501(c)(3) non-profit devoted to eliminating discrimination. We are an instance that blocks authoritarian political violence, ultra-nationalism, fascism, the alt-right, Stalinism, and authoritarian ideology in general. It's intended to be a safe place for those tired of violent rhetoric as well as a place safe from discrimination.

name: aspiechattr.me
title: Aspie Chattr
short_description: A federated social network for aspies and other NDs to be themselves. Chat to others with ASD, ADHD, etc. Connect to the fediverse to bring in content from a whole network of niche sites and follow people who share your interests. Strict yet flexible privacy controls for your content with no ads or tracking.
description:
Aspie Chattr is, above all else, somewhere to be yourself.

A federated social network for aspies and other NDs where you can chat to other peeps with ASD, ADHD, and related conditions. Discuss similar life experiences and your special interests or hyperfixations. Take your (metaphorical) mask off for a bit. You don't have to worry about "being normal" here!

Optionally, choose to see posts from the "fediverse" to bring in content from a whole network of niche sites, find ones related to your interests, and talk to other people who share them. Check out this post for how this works.

Privacy is a core value of the "fediverse" and we are no exception. We provide very flexible privacy controls for your content with no ads and no tracking. By default your posts are public but are not indexed by search engines. If you'd rather make your feed private and only allow those you approve to follow you, it's very easy. If you are happy to just float around the "fediverse" and share your thoughts across many different communities, you can do that too!

There is zero obligation to use a real name or post your face and your information isn't collected and sold to the highest bidder.

Privacy Policy

What information do we collect?

We collect information from you when you register on our site and gather data when you participate in the forum by reading, writing, and evaluating the content shared here.

When registering on our site, you may be asked to enter your name and e-mail address. You may, however, visit our site without registering. Your e-mail address will be verified by an email containing a unique link. If that link is visited, we know that you control the e-mail address.

When registered and posting, we record the IP address that the post originated from. We also may retain server logs which include the IP address of every request to our server.

What do we use your information for?

Any of the information we collect from you may be used in one of the following ways:

  • To personalize your experience â€” your information helps us to better respond to your individual needs.
  • To improve our site â€” we continually strive to improve our site offerings based on the information and feedback we receive from you.
  • To improve customer service â€” your information helps us to more effectively respond to your customer service requests and support needs.
  • To send periodic emails â€” The email address you provide may be used to send you information, notifications that you request about changes to topics or in response to your user name, respond to inquiries, and/or other requests or questions.

How do we protect your information?

We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information when you enter, submit, or access your personal information.

What is your data retention policy?

We will make a good faith effort to:

  • Retain server logs containing the IP address of all requests to this server no more than 90 days.
  • Retain the IP addresses associated with registered users and their posts no more than 5 years.

Do we use cookies?

Yes. Cookies are small files that a site or its service provider transfers to your computer's hard drive through your Web browser (if you allow). These cookies enable the site to recognize your browser and, if you have a registered account, associate it with your registered account.

We use cookies to understand and save your preferences for future visits and compile aggregate data about site traffic and site interaction so that we can offer better site experiences and tools in the future. We may contract with third-party service providers to assist us in better understanding our site visitors. These service providers are not permitted to use the information collected on our behalf except to help us conduct and improve our business.

Do we disclose any information to outside parties?

We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your personally identifiable information. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our site, conducting our business, or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. We may also release your information when we believe release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others rights, property, or safety. However, non-personally identifiable visitor information may be provided to other parties for marketing, advertising, or other uses.

Third party links

Occasionally, at our discretion, we may include or offer third party products or services on our site. These third party sites have separate and independent privacy policies. We therefore have no responsibility or liability for the content and activities of these linked sites. Nonetheless, we seek to protect the integrity of our site and welcome any feedback about these sites.

Online Privacy Policy Only

This online privacy policy applies only to information collected through our site and not to information collected offline.

Your Consent

By using our site, you consent to our web site privacy policy.

Changes to our Privacy Policy

If we decide to change our privacy policy, we will post those changes on this page.

This document is CC-BY-SA. It was last updated May 31, 2018.

Du hast mal in Krefeld gelebt und fragst dich, was dort in den letzten Jahren so geschehen ist und wie sich das Leben verÃ¤ndert hat?
Dir sagt Krefeld, die â€Samt- und Seidenstadtâ€œ am Niederrhein eher nichts, doch jetzt bist du neugierig geworden?

Ihr seid hier alle genau richtig!
Denn unser verbindendes Element ist die Stadt Krefeld.

Auf krefeld.life kÃ¶nnen sich Menschen aus Krefeld und vom Niederrhein sowie alle, die sich fÃ¼r Krefeld interessieren, finden und austauschen. Hier wird Ã¼ber Veranstaltungen informiert und von Veranstaltungen berichtet. Es gibt Tipps rund um Kunst und Kultur, zu Gastronomie und Freizeitgestaltung und ihr kÃ¶nnt Kontakt zu anderen KrefelderInnen knÃ¼pfen.

Wir wÃ¼nschen euch eine gute Zeit!

name: tweetrex.co.uk
title: Tweet Rex
short_description: Great to meet new people, toot, and have some fun.
description: Tweet Rex is a free and open social networking tool. Our only purpose if for people to communicate freely and have some fun. Common Sense Rules The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of tweettex.xo.uk; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies: The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline: - Excessive advertising - Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources - Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions - Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service: - Racism or advocation of racism - Sexism or advocation of sexism - Casteism or advocation of casteism - Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof - Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service: - Sexual depictions of children Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors: - Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that hasspecifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. -Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. - Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment. These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law. Cross-posting "Cross-posting" is the automatic copying of posts from one platform to another. That definition does not include the simultaneous posting to multiple platforms from the same app, such as Twidere or PostyBirb. If you use those apps, we consider those posts original, and the following need not apply. Cross-posting from Mastodon to other platforms is fully permitted.Cross-posting into Mastodon from another platform is permitted under the following terms: - The posts do not include platform-specific references, e.g. talking about "here" meaning Twitter, or including text from other non-Mastodon users verbatim (e.g. cross-posted quote tweets) - The account is at least semi-regularly monitored by the author, so that interactions from Mastodon users are not ignored - The account being cross-posted is owned by the same person. Third-party copying of content is not permitted

name: mastogram.com
title: Mastogram
short_description: Music, Photography, Cars and Travel blogs.
description:
Hello stranger.
It has occurred to me that one of the crucial elements of the early internet was the feeling that there was somebody out there, _somewhere_ on the globe, that was actually responding to that particular thing you were putting out there. It was a special feeling, because it was a sense of connection. Just being online and being part of the few select communities that existed back then was a commitment, and I believe that's in part what made it feel special.

With all the world gaining access to the internet, I think we've gained a lot, but lost this sense of wonder: Since online interactions have now become commonplace to the point of para-social meaninglessness, any single post or message doesn't really feel all that _real_.

Mastodon is still the closest thing I know to that primordial kind of internet, and so I'm putting this server out there. It might get forgotten and buried by Internet noise instantly, or it might survive, and on the off chance that it does and you find it:

I encourage you to use it to post here about whatever you're passionate about at the moment, however niche it might be. It might let you find some likeminded people and maybe recapture a bit of the best aspects of the internet in those early days.

In any case, I sincerely wish you a great day, from one surprisingly-real-but-currently-text-based being to another :)

PS:  No politics. 
PPS: Follow Oma.

name: artisan.chat
title: Artisan.Chat
short_description: Artisan.Chat â€” A fediverse home for creators, crafters, and artists. Community-owned and ad-free.
description:
Artisan.Chat â€” a place for creativity of all kinds, from hobby crafts to studio craft, applied arts to fine arts, all are welcome! Make ArtiChat your new fediverse home; in addition to your works-in-progress, daily random and fun banter, commentary and cited fair-use posts/art/reviews of others' creativity is welcome too. Welcome to y/our ad-free and open source decentralized creative social life. Please read about ArtiChat's etiquette and other stuff before signup. There are mobile apps on both app stores â€” we recommend Metatext (iOS) and Tusky (Android).
ArtiChat is donation-supported and ad-free. Your support via Patreon is appreciated.

name: mastodon.linkedweb.org
title: LinkedWeb
short_description: A new public Mastodon server for the creative mind. Focused primarily on casual gaming, and the general things in life. We are all linked through nature, kindness, humanity, and now- the internet.
description:
LinkedWeb is a Mastodon server that is meant for the casual gamers, and those with creative minds. Many casual games such as Celeste, Stardew Valley, Minecraft, and more- promote creativity, and oftentimes like minds attract each other. Whether you are an artist, computer programmer, game designer, or anything else, you should feel at home here. That's the goal anyway!

The beauty of Mastodon is it allows for server owners, and their communities to moderate and curate content as they wish. This server is not a place for racism, antisemitism, homophobia, transphobia, or alt-right thinking/discourse. Should activities, posting, or otherwise be infringing upon this, a swift ban will be placed upon the infringing account.

name: mstdn.8sp.de
title: EUC Community
short_description: Open to everyone with a focus on end user computing, workplace as well as technology topics. All topics around world events are also welcome.The main languages are German and English.
description:
Rules

"Be excellent to each other" is easier said than done, and means different things to different people.

The following rules are a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours that may lead to deletion of toots, silencing or suspension of accounts, at the descretion of the instance administrators, as described in our Terms.

Please report behaviour that bothers you. We will keep your report confidential.

  • We do not tolerate discriminatory behaviour and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalised groups. These groups may be characterised by any of the following (though this list is naturally incomplete):
    • ethnicity
    • gender identity or expression
    • sexual identity or expression
    • physical characteristics or age
    • disability or illness
    • nationality, residency, citizen status
    • wealth or education
    • religious affiliation, agnosticism or atheism
  • We do not tolerate threatening behaviour, stalking, and doxxing.
  • We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.
  • We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.
  • We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
  • We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
  • Actions intended to damage this instance or its performance may lead to immediate account suspension.
  • Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.

Best practices

The list below is a collection of behaviour that we expect to see from our users. If you see a user go against these best practices in a way that bothers you, please file a report and we will talk to them. While these best practices are designed to be guidelines for a good communal instance, repeated malicious unwillingness to follow the best practices will be considered just like breaking a rule.

  • In general, use the tools provided to foster a considerate and accessible atmosphere. This includes the liberal use of content warnings (especially on potentially disturbing or controversial topics), and alt-text captioning of media files.
  • When possible, provide credit for creative works in your posts that are not your own.
  • Uninvited comments about another user's personal choices, lifestyle or family are strongly discouraged and may be considered harassment. Inappropriate sexual attention, comments about appearance and implication of physical contact will not be tolerated toward any non-consenting user.
  • If you post sexual content or gore, use content warnings.
  • If you post advertisements, use a content warning. Advertisements should not be excessive or automated.
  • Bots may only interact with a user when they're invited by that user to do so.
  • Automated posts and high-frequency posts should be unlisted (rendering visible to everybody, but not appearing on the local timeline) to keep the local timeline of our instance a place of community dialogue and human interaction. This extends to bots, feed posters, Twitter "retweets" and Twitter crossposts with broken mentions ("â€¦@twitter.com"). Crossposter accounts that stop being active participants in our community may be removed at the discretion of the moderators.
  • In discussions, please remain civil, do not insult the people you're talking to. Note that irony, sarcasm, or similar modes of language don't translate well to written language and tend to escalate discussions or misunderstandings.
(These best practices were inspired by the Terms of bsd.network. Thank you!)

Resources

You can find further information on our instance in our GitHub repository, which includes a list of currently blocked or silenced instances.

Modifications we added to this instance can be found at another GitHub repository.

We post occasionally on our Instance blog.

We (@leah and @rixx) are maintaining this instance on our spare time, hardware and nerves. Don't push either of those.


Attribution

This instance uses Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

name: metalhead.club
title: Metalhead.club
short_description: Metalhead.club is a Mastodon instance hosted in Germany and powered by 100% green energy.
description:
Metalhead.club is a Mastodon instance hosted in Germany and powered by 100% green energy. Mastodon is a free and decentralized alternative to well-established social microblogging platforms like Twitter. This instance is especially addressing Metal fans, but of course everybody is welcome to use metalhead.club. If you're using this Mastodon instance, please consider a single donation or monthly, recurring donations via LiberaPay to keep this instance metalling hard.
You can find more information about donations here: donate.650thz.de

name: mastodon.cisti.org
title: Cisti
description:
Chi siamo

Questa istanza Ã¨ gestita allegramente dall'hacklab underscore e fa parte del server autogestito cisti.org.

Cos'Ã¨ Mastodon

Differentemente da altre piattaforme Ã¨ decentralizzato, il che significa che non c'Ã¨ un singolo server, azienda o persona che lo gestisce. Quando qualcuno crea la propria versione di Mastodon, questa Ã¨ chiamata una "istanza". PoichÃ© Mastodon Ã¨ open source, chiunque puÃ² creare la propria istanza di Mastodon con le sue regole. Grazie a questo, tutte le istanze sono possedute, operate e moderate dalla comunitÃ  che le crea. Mentre le persone all'interno di una istanza possono seguirsi l'una l'altra, possono anche decidere di seguirsi all'interno di altre istanze e comunicare con membri di altri server in modo trasparente. Mastodon Ã¨ un social network libero che vuole mantenere le interazioni con le persone al primo posto. Mastodon non puÃ² essere venduto e non puÃ² essere comprato e non puo' essere bloccato dai governi. Ogni persona su mastodon e' libera di unirsi a qualsiasi comunitÃ  voglia, e comunicare con chiunque voglia.

PerchÃ© siamo speciali

  • siamo torinesi
  • ci teniamo alla privacy e rispettiamo l'anonimato

Policy

Qua puoi trovare le policy di mastodon cisti.

Scopri di piÃ¹

Qua una descrizione approfondita del progetto mastodon cisti. E qua un video di spiegazione di mastodon!

Privacy

E' molto semplice: facciamo di tutto per non avere log o informazioni personali da nessuna parte. Quindi se ci chiedono info personali la risposta e' immediata: "Non possiamo darti nessun dato personale perche' non lo abbiamo".

name: blorbo.social
title: Blorbo.Social
short_description: Blorbo.Social is a community of fandom nerds. We talk enthusiastically about our favourite blorbos, create fanart, fanfic, fanvids and other transformative works.
description: Blorbo.Social is a community of fandom nerds. We talk enthusiastically about our favourite blorbos, create fanart, fanfic, fanvids and other transformative works, and share our weird unique selves. We are queer-friendly, kink-friendly, pro-shipping, and okay with (properly tagged) adult content. Members must be 18 or older.

description: Icosahedron.website is a mastodon instance and part of the ActivityPub network / the Fediverse. You can make an account on any Mastodon instance and interact with users on this or any other one. That being said, here's reasons why you should choose this instance: * You like stellated platonic solids very much. * You think our rules make a lot of sense. * You want to try out Mastodon / being on The Fediverse, this place being as good as any other instance for that. * You think, correctly, that @halcy or @dotUser are exceedingly good at online.

name: digitaldata.social
title: DigitalData.social
short_description: A Mastodon based social media server dedicated to the world of Digital Data including data layers, CDPs, analytics, optimisation, personalisation and campaign management.
description: This server is dedicated to the discussion of Digital Data based topics. This includes data layers, customer data platforms (CDPs), analytics, conversion rate optimisation, personalisation and campaign management. Any digital data professional or enthusisatic amateur may join and participate. This server is paid for and administered by DMPG, a digital data agency based in London with team members and clients around the world. Off topic discussion is permitted as long as it adheres to the server rules.

name: the.voiceover.bar
title: The Voiceover Bar
short_description: A place for voiceover artists; actors; producers; engineers and other audio production creatives (professional and amateur) to meet; talk and share in a safe place.
description: Voiceover describes the art of applying one's voice to a production. The genres include, but aren't limited to: audiobook narration; commercials; ADR; videogames; dubbing; station identification; eLearning; narration; corporate/business systems. This is a space for creatives who work with their voice (or others' voices) to join, talk and explore. You can discuss acting, techniques, experiences, jobs or anything else you like (it doesn't need be only voice work). Anyone is welcome to join, whether you are professional or not.

short_description:
A social media community exclusively for seacows.

You have found the best social media app designed for connecting seacows across the globe.

Enjoy premium streamlined sea cow content. Made by sea cows. For sea cows. In a social atmosphere. We take pride in our premium relevant daily content feed that is exclusively curated for Sirenians just like you. Sign up today to receive all sorts of social media updates from your under water friends. Secure and private. Just for sea cows. Free forever. Under water.

Are you a sea cow? A manatee? A dugong? Or any other Sirenian?

Join us! Check out these premium ocean fresh features that were programmed by real sea cows right here at our amazing tech studio at Seacow Pond, Prince Edward Island, Canada:

  • Ad free! Sea cow dot social is an ad free forever application. We only make you look at things that are not ads, that you actually want to look at. Like products you are interested in because you are a sea cow, dugong, manatee, or other sea mammal.
  • We never collect your personal information. Ever! Totally secure! Our completely invasive and undetectable data collection techniques are totally opaque to you because of our proprietary systems. If we did collect data about you, you wouldn't know it and you agreed to it anyway. Plus we only use it for marketing purposes, to make sure that your under water timeline is displaying the most relevant sea cow premium content.
  • You decide what you see! Since we don't display ads or collect personal data your timeline is displayed just like you want! Our deep neural net interprets all of the things that you have been doing on all of your devices that we have been able to discover in order to determine what you have decided to see, without you needing to think! It is the most killer whale of a social media web app that all your ocean based friends will enjoy from any device - desktop, mobile, on TV, or even in flight!

name: queer.party
title: Queer Party!
short_description: A silly instance of Mastodon for queer folk and non-queer folk alike. Let's be friends!
description:
A silly instance of Mastodon for queer folk and non-queer folk alike. Let's be friends!

Due to abuse by a malicious individual, registrations are subject to approval. It sucks, but the alternative is risking "threat intelligence" companies blindly marking the service as malicious.

Note for folks coming from Tumblr and Twitter; NSFW content is allowed here, but you must tag your posts as NSFW, and provide a clear (but not explicit or overly descriptive) content warning for them! NSFW profile pictures or banners, or explicit usernames/display names are not allowed. Please keep it friendly!

Tips are appreciated! You can throw spare change my way by visiting my tip-jar!

We have a firm belief that in the normal course of our universe, they would never setup a Mastodon instance and that it is highly hilarious and out of character for this to exist. 

We are not interested in donations and any other contributions for this instance. If you would like to donate, please give it to a charity or a person in need.

Are you trans? Like to shitpost? Experience existential dread? Girlcock.club was started as an instance focused primarily on giving trans femmes a voice and a place to vent. If you experience trans-misogyny or are sick of being moderated by cis folks who may not have your interests in mind, this is the place for you. This instance is the work of one very confused and scared trans woman. Donations are very much appreciated. Become a patron

name: social.matej-lach.me
title: Matej Lach's mastodon
description:
Hi there!

I am a free software developer. I enjoy working on useful software, as well as advocating for software freedom and the use of open standards, promoting data ownership, decentralization and privacy. If this is important to you, I may be worth following.
If you like Go, Rust, or Swift, it may be worth following me as well. 

Besides computing, I enjoy metal, a good read and occasionally some gaming, (not much time for that these days).

name: toot.garden
title: Toot.Garden
short_description: A server for the creative mind. Focused primarily on casual gaming, art, and the general things in life. We are all linked through nature, kindness, humanity, and now- the internet.
description:
Toot.Garden is a Mastodon server that is meant for the casual gamers, artists, and those with creative minds. Many casual games such as Celeste, Stardew Valley, Minecraft, and more- promote creativity, and oftentimes like minds attract each other. Whether you are an artist, computer programmer, game designer, or anything else, you should feel at home here. This should be your place to grow, connect, and share! That's the goal anyway!

The beauty of Mastodon is it allows for server owners, and their communities to moderate and curate content as they wish. This server is not a place for racism, antisemitism, homophobia, transphobia, or alt-right thinking/discourse. Should activities, posting, or otherwise be infringing upon this, a swift ban will be placed upon the infringing account.

description: kith: [noun] one's friends and acquaintances Kith Kitchen is a Mastodon instance centred around food and friends, plants and people, cooking and culture. Share recipes, food photography, political thoughts, or just chew the fat - everyone is welcome here providing you follow the Code of Conduct. Users who post here are not required to put content warnings on posts mentioning or picturing food.

description:
Bonn.social ist ein soziales Netzwerk fÃ¼r mit Fokus auf Bonn, Rhein-Sieg und Region und ist ein Teil des Fediverse.

  • Es funktioniert so Ã¤hnlich wie Twitter, aber man hat 500 Zeichen zur VerfÃ¼gung und mehr Einstellungen fÃ¼r die PrivatsphÃ¤re.
  • Es funktioniert so Ã¤hnlich wie E-Mail, weil jeder seinen eigenen Server betreiben kann, trotzdem kann jeder mit jedem im Netzwerk schreiben.
  • Die Software fÃ¼r dieses Netzwerk heiÃŸt Mastodon. Es ist eine freie Software, jeder kann sie nutzen und den gesamten Quellcode lesen.
  • Auch deine Daten sind hier frei. Du kannst jederzeit deine Follows und Daten exportieren und zu einem anderen Server umziehen oder einen eigenen Server betreiben (lassen).

Bonn.social ist eine Mastodon-Instanz von Bonn.digital fÃ¼r Bonn-Rhein-Sieg und einfach alle, die die Region mÃ¶gen. Thema darf natÃ¼rlich gerne Bonn sein, muss es aber nicht. Die Regeln werden von den Bonn.social-Administratoren und -Moderatoren so entwickelt, dass sich alle hier wohlfÃ¼hlen kÃ¶nnen.

Wenn Du uns freiwillig unterstÃ¼tzen mÃ¶chtest, findest Du hier weitere Informationen: Bonn.social unterstÃ¼tzen!. Etwas zwischen 1-5â‚¬ monatlich bzw. 12-60â‚¬ jÃ¤hrlich sind ein guter Richtwert. Mehr ist auch ok.

Pflichtangaben: Impressum, DatenschutzerklÃ¤rung

name: absolutelyhar.am
title: Absolutely Har.am
short_description: A Muslim(-ish) online community for anyone who identifies with Muslims or Islam in any shape or form. Part of the Mastodon cinematic fediverse.
description:
Hello / Salam!

We are absolutelyhar.am. An online Muslim(-ish) community for anybody affiliated or identifying with Muslims/Islam. We're committed to having a dedicated space and community that provides a safe place for the Muslim diaspora on the internet. This came (like a lot of other communities) from the implosion of Twitter and we wanted to make sure that folks had a place to go.

We are built off of Mastodon, a free social networking application that connects multiple different communities together. By creating a free account on our site, you can follow anybody in the Mastodon world (more affectionately called "the fediverse"). Of course, to run our own social network costs money, resources, and talent. If you want to support this journey, we'd appreciate any support and feedback on how we can make this space that much better. You can support us at https://patreon.com/absolutelyhar.am.

name: mastodon.opportunis.me
title: Mastodon Opportun.e
short_description: An instance for people speaking English or French. It works on the principle of cooptation: if you know someone who is already registered, they can invite you.
description:
Cette instance est hÃ©bergÃ©e sur un serveur chez Hetzner et elle est managÃ© par un administrateur systÃ¨me lambda.

Une instance qui fonctionne sur le principe de la cooptation : si vous connaissez une personne dÃ©jÃ  inscrite, elle peut vous inviter. Nous fonctionnons avec des rÃ¨gles simples :

  • serveur rÃ©servÃ© aux personnes parlant franÃ§ais ou anglais, par souci de facilitÃ© de modÃ©ration.
  • Sexisme, racisme, homophobie et toutes formes d'exclusion des minoritÃ©s sont Ã  proscrire pour le bien Ãªtre de tou.te.s.
  • Respectez la vie privÃ©e des personnes.
  • Utilisez les tags et autres CW que vous jugez adaptÃ©s, en particulier pour le contenu NotSafeForWork (NSFW).
  • Essayez d'Ãªtre prÃ©vÃ©nant.e.s et inclusif.ve.s.
  • Si l'un de vos propos est perÃ§u comme excluant et que quelqu'un vous en informe, Ã©coutez. Nous sortirons tou.te.s grandi.e.s d'un tel dialogue.

Sachez que nous prÃ©fÃ©rerons toujours notre libertÃ© d'Ãªtre ensemble Ã  votre libertÃ© d'exclure.

Merci au POOP, dont je ne cesse de m'inspirer de leur code de conduite.

Silence instance :

For non-french people.

This instance is work on a cooptation model: if you know someone here, they can invite yuu.

Rules:

  • Server only for french and english speaking, to facilitate the moderation.
  • Sexism, racism, homophobia and any other minority exclusion should be avoided.
  • Respect for privacy.
  • Use tags and CW when you consider them relevant, in particular for NotSafeForWork (NSFW) contents.
  • Try to be considerate and inclusive.
  • If you are saying things that could be perceived as excluding and someone informs you, listen. We will all come out enriched from the dialogue.

Be aware that we will always prefer our freedom to be united than your freedom to exclude.

I decided to not moderate outside the instance (blacklist other instances and/or users for other instances), with a few exceptions which will be publicly announced for serious cases. I consider that everyone should make his own choices regarding what he wants to read from outside.

Thanks to the POOP for their inspiring code of conduct.

Cette instance est hÃ©bergÃ©e sur un serveur chez Hetzner et elle est managÃ© par un administrateur systÃ¨me lambda plutÃ´t motivÃ©.

This instance is hosted on a Hetzner server and it's managed by an average system administrator but rather committed.

name: wandering.shop
title: The Wandering Shop
short_description: The Wandering Shop is an instance initially geared for the science fiction and fantasy community, but open to anyone. Our local timeline should have the feel of a coffee shop at a good convention.
description:
Registration is currently invite-only due to the load imposed by the exodus from other sites.

The Wandering Shop is a Mastodon instance initially geared for the science fiction and fantasy community but open to anyone. We want our 'local' timeline to have the feel of a coffee shop at a good convention: tables full of friendly conversation on a wide variety of topics. We welcome everyone who wants to participate, so long as you're willing to abide by our code of conduct.

Code of Conduct

We want this to be a fun, pleasant, and harassment-free experience for everyone. By joining the Wandering Shop, you're agreeing to abide by our code of conduct.

name: musicians.today
title: Musicians Today
short_description: musicians.today is a community for musicians of all levels, instruments, regions, languages, and genres.
description:
This is a place for musicians to interact, but you can bring your whole self.

You don't have to be a professional musician to join, but you should at least play an instrument or sing as a hobby.

Sharing your own music is strongly encouraged, even (especially!) if it's not polished. Recommending other people's music is allowed, but be clear that you're not sharing your own work. Basically, you must follow copyright law and avoid plagiarism of any kind.

name: smeap.com
title: Smeap.com
description: Smeap is the honk of a flamingo. Smeap was also at least once, a storybook land at the weird intersection of TV ads and the worlds they seem to inhabit. It was a place where wars were fought over sodas, and talking polar bears had very good reasons to guard soda machines. It was a place where rainbow color candies were harvested for electric power. It was a place where a prairie dog might move to big city inhabited mostly by Pink Flamingos to follow her dream to be private investigator, only to get slowly entangled in the seedy underbelly of crime and prohibited soda trading of the Neon Flamingos and their syndicate. Social media at times lately feels like it has become almost entirely seedy underbelly with very little upside. Maybe it needs more storybook worlds.

name: mspsocial.net
title: MSP Social.net
short_description: A community centered on the Twin Cities of Minneapolis and St. Paul, Minnesota, and their surrounding region. Predominantly queer with a focus on urban and social justice issues.
description:
A community centered on the Twin Cities of Minneapolis and St. Paul, Minnesota, and their surrounding region.

An alternative to social networks that connected people in the region that have either died away or driven people off with unethical or anti-social policies.

MSP Social is a noncommercial community service, hosted and administered by @lawremipsum. Users should not feel obligated to contribute financially to the project. But contributions to defray server costs and/or for possible future expansion are welcome at Patreon, Liberapay or via PayPal to lawremipsum at gmail.

We financially support local community-oriented organizations. Currently, we support WedgeLive, Streets MN, Grease Rag and The MN Tool Library. Future support of community-oriented organizations will be determined by accountholders, donors and the admin, and is likely to be focused on groups that advance the values of the donors and encourage underrepresented voices in community and urban planning spheres.

Recurring contributors: @hillobeans, @brennen@mastodon.social, @Jennybellium, @densetsu, @iangreenleaf, @britvulcan, @joeld, @yeahno, @paulference, @billmk, @brandon, @benjotron, @june @wafflesoup and anonymous.

If you're a current Twitter user, here is a tool that can help Twitter friends find each other on Mastodon.

name: peoplemaking.games
title: People Making Games
short_description: We're a community of folks who celebrate the craft of creating interactive experiences, whether they're working in games or around them! This is a space for games folks and creatives to call home!
description:
We're building a community that celebrates games and the craft of creating interactive experiences. It's a space to play together, share with each other, learn new things, build connections, and help one other grow! We take the broad view of the term "Game Maker". Whether you're in games or around them, fresh faced or veteran, digital or physical, this is a space for you, a home in the Fediverse!

Our instance is built around invites to facilitate organic growth, and all invited members are approved immediately. The hope is that, by letting friends invite friends, we can maintain a positive and supportive culture with strong connections between each and every member. If you know somebody who's already on the server, consider reaching out to them! 

Don't know anyone but feel like this is a place you'd like to be a part of? Feel free to request access! Please let us know a bit about you, and other places to find you, so we can process your request quickly!

description:
Willkommen, Barcampende!

Wir sind eine kleine Mastodon Instanz fÃ¼r Barcamper (m/w/d) im deutschsprachigen Raum. Initiiert und betrieben vom Barcamp Hannover e.V.

Wir betreiben diese Instanz, weil wir denken, dass es eine Alternative zu Services wie Twitter, Facebook, Instagram & Co. gegen muss. Ohne Tracking, ohne Erstellung von Profilen und Algorithmus, der Euch BeitrÃ¤ge vorsortiert.

Bitte schaut Euch unsere "Hausregeln" an. Wir bitten Euch, diese im Hinterkopf zu behalten, wenn ihr unsere Instanz nutzt und VerstÃ¶ÃŸe entsprechend zu melden. Unser Moderations-Team kÃ¼mmert sich um die KlÃ¤rung und Vermittelt gern in Problemsituationen.

Benefits of using a masto account here: - generous limits for toot length/profile fields/etc. - will add emojos upon request, just DM me (large blobcat collection already) - will block on sight, just DM me (large blocklist already) - glitch-soc features (https://glitch-soc.github.io/docs/ ) - blazing fast thanks to my loving benefactress<3 - admin is hot Drawbacks: - mostly empty "Local" timeline - limited federation as of now - software may be unstable - no themes but default ones as of now Email forwards and Matrix chat @transmom.love are also available upon request.

name: trans.house
title: Trans House
short_description: A server specifically made for and run by the trans community!
description: Trans House is a Mastodon instance designed for trans people. While there are many excellent Mastodon communities out there for the broader LGBT community, this instance's focus is specifically on the trans community. FAQ Do I need to be trans to join No! While this instance is designed for the trans community, for a number of reasons, we are welcoming to allies and anyone else who may feel some affinity to the trans community. We would encourage you to find the instance that best matches your interests and identity, if that is Trans House you are more than welcome Does that mean chasers are allowed Absolutely not. This instance is designed to be a safe space for the trans community. If you are here to objectify or otherwise sexualize trans people without consent you are not welcome here.

name: activism.openworlds.info
title: Activism
short_description: To support this server and the OMN project https://opencollective.com/open-media-network
description:
Founded on #4opens, motivated by the #PGA hallmarks and moderated by an ethical code of conduct. Its an unfettered space for Activists and groups to communicate via #openweb projects.

"We can't engage as communities, unless we have money. I can't even express how angry this makes me."
- an activist group using Facebook. People and organisations who feel this way are our initial targets.

We are launching two new Mastodon instances for activists and campaigners to aid communication of grassroot groups; putting social media back in our hands by providing a free, unfettered home for campaigners, NGOâ€™s and activists to communicate among their peers and beyond.

This project is a way out of the restricted, algorithmic, for-profit mediation and commercialisation of communication we increasingly experience. If you do not pay to "boost" each post, a Facebook page will only reach 3-6% of members. This soon becomes an expensive drain on limited NGO and activist budgets.
Activists and campaigners alike are ready to shift their outreach away from the corporate social networks paid-per-view â€œwalled gardensâ€.

Mastodon is the worlds largest free open source decentralised microblogging network; itâ€™s thousands of unique, interconnected communities, filled with different people, interests, languages, and needs.
Youâ€™re free to join any community you like, or better yet, host your own, on your own terms. It remains possible for members of each to instance to interact with others.
There is no monopoly by a single commercial company, no ads, and no tracking.

We aim to help activism/campaigning groups to make this step now.

https://campaign.openworlds.info
https://activism.openworlds.info

A note on Security and Privacy - these take a somewhat different shape within the #openweb. Have a read about our thoughts on the matter.

How are OMN projects run?

name: booktoot.club
title: BookToot Club
short_description: A place for book lovers to talk about books and whatever else is on their minds.
description:
A place for sharing and discussing books. After suggesting a Mastodon-based book club and getting a lot more interest than I expected, I decided to make a place specifically for facilitating that. So this aims to be a home for creating and organizing book clubs and read-alongs.

Not just for clubs, though. Like books? Want to talk about books and read about what other people are reading? Just want to be around book people but also talk about whatever is on your mind? Congrats, you're welcome here.

Well, with some restrictions. No hate speech, threats, etc. See our rules/code of conduct for more of that and general posting guidelines.

Not looking to join a new instance but wanting to join in the discussion anyway? No problem, just look for and use the hashtags.

This instance also now has its own Patreon page to help with the basic costs and maybe even (if I'm being very optimistic) help it grow into more. Check it out if you're willing/able to consider helping me out that way.

Thanks for stopping by!

This instance uses Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. Become a Patron! or donate on Ko-Fi. In both cases, only if you want to. No pressure if you can't or just aren't interested. Thanks!

name: asocial.sysrq.in
title: Cyberia
short_description: Cyberia is a little Fediverse safespace :3
description:
Welcome to Cyberia! We're happy you're considering to toot with us and taking the time to read our policy.

# User Policy

## Scope and Audience

This policy is for users who have their accounts on sysrq.in. There is a separate peering policy for deciding when and how to federate with other instances. Generally, for users on the instance a higher standard applies.

Our instance is only available to users for personal use. Accounts with a commercial background should look elsewhere. Promoting your own work is okay, as long as it is not the focus of your account.

## Intent and Remedies

Our guiding principle for remedies is that of intent and willingness to correct ones own behavior. It is okay if you fuck up. But we expect you to correct your behavior as soon as we point it out.

Please approach the moderation team with any issues or questions about this policy, or any other policy in this document. We're always happy to expand in the rationale of these policies and provide advice about being excellent to each other.

If you disagree and reject our requests to fix your behavior, maybe this isn't the right instance for you.

## Banned Content

Content that is illegal in the Russian Federation is subject to suspensions. Independent from their legal status, any depictions of minors in a sexual context, real or imagined, is banned and will lead to suspensions.

## Prohibited Content

We have a zero-tolerance policy against bigoted behavior. This especially includes, but is not limited to racism, sexism, xenophobia, antisemitism, islamophobia, transphobia and ableism.

Do not explicitly endorse systems of oppression as a remedy to the same. This especially applies to the myth of meritocracy.

Do not argue for the existence or relevance of reverse-racism or reverse-sexism. Racism and sexism are deep structural issues with culture and not the expression of single persons.
Content Warnings

We ask all users to make use of the Content Warning ("CW") feature in GoToSocial extensively. While this is a hard requirement for any adult or disturbing content, particularly involving discussion about prohibited content, we highly encourage using it as a general disclaimer regarding the content of your toot.

If someone asks you to add a warning to a particular type of content, it is generally a good idea to follow through.

## Personal Pronouns

We highly encourage you to add your pronouns to your profile and check your fellow users profiles for pronouns before engaging in conversation with them.

## Discussions and Debate

If you want to start an argument, it is better to ask if the person you're engaging would be interested in hearing your take first. We're trying to build a space where everyone feels comfortable being themselves, not a debate club. When you're asked to disengage, do so.

## Data usage

All original content shared on sysrq.in is the sole property of its creator. This data may not be used, published, or reproduced in any place other than Mastodon and related federated platforms, for any reason, without explicit permission granted on a user by user basis. Any datamining or harvesting operations without full prior consent of all affected users are not permitted on sysrq.in.

# Peering Policy

## Scope

This policy is for anyone on the fediverse who wants to interact with our users or join our relay. There is a separate user policy for accounts hosted on sysrq.in.

## Banned Content

Content that is illegal in the Russian Federation is subject to suspensions. Independent from their legal status, any depictions of minors in a sexual context, real or imagined, is banned and will lead to suspensions. For instances where such content is legal, a media block silence is enforced instead.

## Prohibited Content

We have a zero-tolerance policy against bigoted behavior. This especially includes, but is not limited to racism, sexism, xenophobia, antisemitism, islamophobia, transphobia and ableism.

Instances that do not moderate such content might be silenced or suspended, based on severity. Outright fascism for instance will be suspended, while reactionary ideology will usually be silenced.

## Harassment

Instances hosting users that do not follow our "disengage on request" policy or send messages that can be construed to fall into our definition of prohibited content may be silenced or suspended based on severity. If the severity is not too high the user should be silenced or suspended first before a grace period where the instance moderation team is given time to rectify the situation.

name: myidanonymous.me
title: MYID
short_description:
MYIDverified.me coming soon to protect your blockchain assets/cryptomoney from theft and even negligent password loss! Brought to you by "The Money Project" by OkGlobal Coin SWITCH-MYID.

Decentralized social network to protect the human right to free speech and spread of information to be discussed openly and proven correct or false.

User account content and followers are owned by the account user. Users are able to migrate content and followers to other servers or their own for any reason at anytime so long as the MYID server hosting the user's account is capable/functioning/operational.

MYID is a free, open-source social network server based on ActivityPub. All MYID servers are interoperable as a federated network (users on one server can seamlessly communicate with users from another one, including non-MYID software that implements ActivityPub)! MYID is free, open-source software licensed under AGPLv3. The public github repository is available at https://github.com/YouGotHacked001/MYIDanonymous.

Decentralized social network to protect the human right to free speech and spread of information to be discussed openly and proven correct or false.

User account content and followers are owned by the account user. Users are able to migrate content and followers to other servers or their own for any reason at anytime so long as the MYID server hosting the user's account is capable/functioning/operational.

MYID is a free, open-source social network server based on ActivityPub. All MYID servers are interoperable as a federated network (users on one server can seamlessly communicate with users from another one, including non-MYID software that implements ActivityPub)! MYID is free, open-source software licensed under AGPLv3. The public github repository is available at https://github.com/YouGotHacked001/MYIDanonymous.

name: witches.live
title: witches.live
short_description: A witchy space for most any face! Whether a witch or a witch-respecter, join the coven that is free of fash, TERFs, feds, and bigots
description:
Welcome to Witches Union Local #669 witches.live, the witches' union/coven that is definitely not a cult!

This is a mastodon instance for witches. It is not for cops, feds, fash, TERFs, and/or abusers of any kind. If you are a witch please join us! If you are a cop, fed, fash, TERF, and/or abuser, go away forever.

Other federated services available on witches.live:
https://bophadees.witches.live - A Pleroma instance for experimentation, checking out Pleroma, and for wider communication with the fediverse. Less stable, no instance blocks.
https://hexagram.witches.live - A Pixelfed instance that is similar to Instagram that federates with a wide variety of federated platforms including Mastodon and Pleroma.

title: queer.af
short_description:
queer.af, your cosy queer space
queer.af is a mastodon instance for those who are queer or queer-adjacent who would like a more pleasant social media experience.
description: ğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ The best tl;dr for this instance would be â€œcosy queer spaceâ€. In light of Twitterâ€™s recently more and more blatant veer towards full-on nazi platforming, and their history of banning queer people and separating us from our support networks for reasons such as â€œbeing suicidalâ€, â€œsaying fuckâ€ and â€œbreathingâ€, this place exists as a refuge for those of us who are just tired of it all. We absolutely will not platform nazis, we will not ban people for reaching out for help from their network, and we will aggressively blacklist users and instances facilitating harassment of our members. You donâ€™t have to be queer to sign up for an account, just donâ€™t be a nazi, and donâ€™t harass anybody. You can also sign up for an account at any other instance in the fediverse!

name: discourse.social
title: discourse.social
short_description: a Mastodon instance for pro-democracy, pro-science voices, established by illumineX on November 7, 2022.
description: Discourse.social is a Mastodon instance for pro-democracy, pro-science voices. We founded Discourse.social because we believe that social media may have accidentally become an essential part of the global discourse for democracy. That global conversation probably won't be happening on Twitter, the platform on which it first emerged, for very much longer. Still, the conversation and the social graph that makes it possible has become vital. If you agree, please feel free to join us. If you would like to create a profile here, send email to me at: moose@discourse.social and include a link to your blog, Twitter profile or other social media presence, to help us see who you are. It helps us determine that you're not an imposter if you set up a profile at illumineX maker of EyeSpy, the cartoon eyes toy for Mac. We also make scalable mobile app and cloud systems for enterprise, government, and venture-capital-funded startup companies.

name: social.coop
title: social.coop
short_description: A Fediverse instance for people interested in cooperative and collective projects.
description:
social.coop is a cooperatively-run corner of the Fediverse. The instance is democratically governed by its members, who generally share an interest in the co-op model, but topics of discussion range widely.

If you are interested in joining our community, please review our Bylaws and Code of Conduct. If you agree with them, you are welcome to join our community by applying at this link!

Our instance is supported by sliding scale contributions of $1-10/mo made via Open Collective. You must have an active Open Collective account to apply for membership; you may set one up here

name: fosstodon.org
title: Fosstodon
short_description: Fosstodon is an English speaking Mastodon instance that is open to anyone who is interested in technology; particularly free & open source software.
description:
Fosstodon is an English speaking Mastodon instance that is dedicated to Free & Open Source Software, or FOSS as many call it.

Fosstodon is for people who are interested in open source technology and the awesome community around it. Whether that be Linux, open source software like Firefox, or Mastodon itself. If you're interested in technology, Fosstodon is a great place to start.

We're not just techies on Fosstodon though! We like to think of tech as the hobby that brings us all together, but it doesn't define us. That's why we encourage all our members to post about whatever interests them, not just tech (so long as it is allowed under our CoC).

name: floss.social
title: FLOSS.social
short_description: For people who care about, support, and build Free, Libre, and Open Source Software (FLOSS).
description: FLOSS.social was launched on 1 April 2018 as a Mastodon server for people who care about, support, or build Free, Libre, and Open Source Software (FLOSS). Of course, discussions aren't limited to just FLOSS -- let's share our unique interests! English is preferred for maximum conversation opportunities within the FLOSS community, but it is not required. Respect is required, however: Users on FLOSS.social agree to abide by the Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct. This service was installed and is maintained in part by Masto.Host with equipment located at OVH, object storage provided by BunnyCDN, and outbound email via SparkPost. You can support this server financially through the Supporter Program, managed using the nonprofit & free software platform Liberapay.

name: stereodon.social
title: Stereodon.social
short_description:
Stereodon.social Ã¨ un social network autogestito e open source dedicato alla musica.
Stanchi di scambiarci informazioni tramite sistemi eticamente in contrasto con i nostri principi, abbiamo deciso di dar vita a questa istanza.
Siamo convinti che slegare la diffusione di musica da logiche competitive, possa favorire il fare comunitÃ , quindi un maggiore e piÃ¹ sincero scambio di informazioni.


[ENG]

Stereodon.social is a self-managed social network devoted to underground music.
Tired of exchanging information through systems that are ethically in contrast to our principles, we decided to give life to this instance.
We are convinced that unlink the diffusion of music from competitive logics can favor making communities, therefore a greater and more sincere exchange of information.


languages accepted: Italian, English (for moderation reasons)

contact: admin [AT] stereodon.social
description:
Stereodon.social Ã¨ un social network autogestito dedicato alla musica underground. Per maggiori informazioni leggi il nostro Manifesto. Per contattarci: admin [AT] stereodon.social

Qui altre istanze consigliate.

In addition to the Italian language, we also accept English. --- ENG Stereodon.social is a self-managed social network dedicated to underground music. contact us: admin [AT] stereodon.social

short_description: We are an inclusive Mastodon community for everything tabletop (and more).
description: We are an inclusive Mastodon community for everything tabletop (and more). We welcome everyone that wants to be part of the community, boardgamers, RPG players, casual gamers, party gamers, hobbyists, LARPers, game designers and publishers, RPG characters, artists, writers, vlogers, podcasters, reviewers, streamers, lego builders and more. This is meant to be a positive and safe space for people to enjoy each other's ideas, opinion and have fun. To keep tabletop.social that way, the Code of Conduct and Rules will be applied and enforced thoroughly.

For those interested in the tech, Tiggi.es is run on a 3 node cluster consisting of: * 2x HP Elite 800 G9/i7-12700t with 64GB DDR5, 2x 2TB high write endurance PCIE 4.0 NVMe/3.84TB Enterprise SATA SSD * 1 HP Elite 600 G6/i9-10900t with 64GB DDR4, 2x 2TB high write endurance PCIE 3.0 NVMe/3.84TB Enterprise SATA SSD All running ProxMox Virtual Environment with replication and nightly backups to both RAID-6 and LTO-5. name: glammr.us
title: glammr.us Mastodon
short_description: glammr.us is a space for folks interested in productive conversation about, well, galleries, libraries, archives, museums, memory work and records. It is pronounce â€œglamorousâ€ as our work are often charmingly or fascinatingly attractive, especially in a mysterious or magical way. Sometimes it is also full of excitement, adventure, and unusual activity (oh, yes). It is also inspired by Toysâ€™Râ€™us to showcase the fun playful side of glammr.us tooters. But you don't necessarily have to only post about GLAMMR-related topics, bring your whole self. Talk about fun things you saw, your exciting day or even your struggles. Many of us are Twitter refugees looking for an inclusive and community supported approach to social media. If any of these things sound good to you, consider joining us by contributing as little as a $1 a month on our patreon to help keep our server online. Take a look at our code of conduct.
